an9.69:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of stinginess.
an9.69:1.3: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teaching.
an9.69:1.4: These are the five kinds of stinginess.
an9.69:2.1: To give up these five kinds of stinginess you should develop the four kinds of mindfulness meditation. …”
